Remaja yang Ditangkap Tim Penikam Sudah 2 Kali Prank Pocong di Jalanan
03 Nov 2019, 12:32 by Reinhard Soplantila
Makassar - Polisi menangkap dua orang remaja yang melakukan aksi prank menjadi hantu pocong di kota Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan (Sulsel). Aksi kedua remaja ini terbilang iseng dan hanya untuk kepentingan video prank semata.
"Hanya mau saja prank," kata salah seorang pemeran hantu pocong, pada hari Minggu (3/11/2019).
Dari hasil interogasi, remaja tersebut mengaku kerap membuat video prank menjadi hantu pocong di jalanan kota Makassar. Aksi serupa telah dua kali dilakukan oleh hantu pocong palsu tersebut.
"Saya baru dua kali jadi pocong. (lokasinya) pindah-pindah biasa (jalan) landak biasa disitu (jalan banta-bantaeng)," kata remaja itu.
Kedua remaja itu diciduk oleh tim Penikam Polrestabes Makassar di Jalan Banta Bantaeng sesaat setelah melakukan aksi video pranknya. Pengakuan warga sekitar ke polisi, mereka diresahkan oleh aksi kedua remaja itu.
"Memang sih pengakuannya masyarakat, kegiatannya setiap malam itu selalu menakut-nakuti dengan menggunakan (dandanan) pocong," ujar Komandan Tim Penikam Ipda Arif Muda, saat dikonfirmasi terpisah.
"Tadi malam kebetulan aksi (prank pocong) lagi, ya warga langsung melaporkan," imbuhnya.
Sejauh ini polisi belum memutuskan apakah akan menahan kedua remaja tersebut atau dikembalikan ke orang tuanya.

Teenagers Arrested by the Stabbing Team Have Prank Pocong 2 Times on the Street
03 Nov 2019, 12:32 by Reinhard Soplantila
Makassar - Police arrested two teenagers who carried out a prank action to become a ghost pocong in the city of Makassar, South Sulawesi (South Sulawesi). The action of these two teenagers is fairly fun and is only for the sake of prank videos.
"Just want to prank," said one pocong ghost cast, on Sunday (3/11/2019).
From the results of the interrogation, the teenager admitted that he often made prank videos into pocong ghosts on the streets of Makassar. Similar actions have been carried out twice by the fake ghost Pocong.
"I have only been pocong twice. (The location is) moving around the ordinary (road) porcupine is usually there (banta-bantaeng road)," said the teenager.
The two teenagers were captured by the Makassar Police Penikam Team on Jalan Banta Bantaeng shortly after carrying out a video prank action. Recognition of local residents to the police, they were troubled by the action of the two teenagers.
"Indeed, the community acknowledges it, its activities every night are always frightening by using pocong (grooming)," said Commander of the Ipda Stabbing Team Arif Muda, when confirmed separately.
"Last night happened to be another (prank pocong) action, yes the residents immediately reported," he added.
So far the police have not yet decided whether to detain the two teenagers or return them to their parents.
